thread.title: Lyricist Hari is swamped with music projects
thread.title_full: Lyricist Hari is swamped with music projects - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Lyricist Hari is swamped with music projects
text:
Hari Narayanan who wrote mesmerizing lyrics for hit songs of 2014, like 'Olenjali Kuruvi...' and 'Kattumooliyo...' , is busy writing for the upcoming films of M-twon.
"I have wriiten for around ten films now. This includes Pavada and Gemini . Discussions are on for Action Hero Biju too," says Hari.
